00002 // *** Author(s): Th. Fraichard
00003 // *** Last modified on 31 Jul 2008

00005 // Description:
00006 
00007 #include <iostream>
00008 #include <fstream>
00009 using namespace std;
00010 
00011 #include <display.h>
00012 #include <graphicize.h>
00013 #include <utilities.h>
00014 #include <configuration.h>
00015 #include <paths.h>
00016 #include <cc-dubins.h>
00017 #include <cc-rs.h>
00018 
00019 // maximum curvature and derivative of curvature
00020 double KappaMax = 1.0; //0.2;
00021 double SigmaMax = 1.0; //0.05;
00022 
00023 // start configuration
00024 SMT_Configuration start (1, 1, 0, 0);
00025 // end configuration
00026 SMT_Configuration goal (0, 0, 0.785, 0);
00027 // graphic trace mode toggle.  if TRUE then do not reset the graphic
00028 // display window between two clicks
00029 bool graphic_trace = false;
00030 // graphic display and control windows
00031 char *window_title = strdup("SMT");
00032 FLTK_Display_Control control (100, 250, -250, 500, 500, window_title);
00033 
00034 // test callback function: compute both cc-dubins and cc-reeds-shepp paths
00035 void cb_dubins_rs (Fl_Widget *w, void *data) {
00036   FLTK_Display *display = (FLTK_Display *)w;
00037 
00038   // reset graphic objects list
00039   if ( !graphic_trace ) display->clear_objects ();
00040 
00041   // retrieve clicked position
00042   double world_x = display_to_world_x (Fl::event_x (),
00043                                        display->get_unit_size (),
00044                                        display->get_scroll_x ());
00045   double world_y = display_to_world_y (Fl::event_y (),
00046                                        display->get_unit_size (),
00047                                        display->get_scroll_y ());
00048   // update end configuration
00049   goal.x = world_x;
00050   goal.y = world_y;
00051 
00052   // compute cc-dubins path, display it in red
00053   SMT_CC_Dubins_Path *d_path;
00054   
00055   d_path = cc_dubins (start, goal, KappaMax, SigmaMax);
00056   d_path->print (true);         // alphanumeric display
00057   graphicize (*d_path, display, FL_RED, FL_SOLID, 0); // graphic display
00058 
00059   // compute cc-reeds-shepp path, display it in green
00060   SMT_CC_RS_Path *rs_path;
00061 
00062   rs_path = cc_reeds_shepp (start, goal, 1, 1);
00063   rs_path->print (true);        // alphanumeric display
00064   graphicize (*rs_path, display, FL_GREEN, FL_SOLID, 0); // graphic display
00065 
00066   // display start and end configuration in black
00067   graphicize (start, display, FL_BLACK, FL_SOLID, 0);
00068   graphicize (goal, display, FL_BLACK, FL_SOLID, 0);
00069 
00070   // update graphic display
00071   display->redraw ();
00072 }
00073 
00074 
00075 // test callback function: empty
00076 void cb_empty (Fl_Widget *w, void *data) {
00077   FLTK_Display *display = (FLTK_Display *)w;
00078 
00079   // reset graphic objects list
00080   if ( !graphic_trace ) display->clear_objects ();
00081 
00082   // display start and end configuration in black
00083   graphicize (start, display, FL_BLACK, FL_SOLID, 0);
00084   graphicize (goal, display, FL_BLACK, FL_SOLID, 0);
00085 
00086   // update graphic display
00087   display->redraw ();
00088 }
00089 
00090 // ############################################################################
00091 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00092 {
00093   control.add_callback (cb_empty);
00094   control.clear_objects ();
00095 
00096   Fl::run();
00097 }
